cards.rules_text:
[i]Aethercast[/i] — Aetheric Revolution enters with two charge counters on it if {C}{C} was spent to cast it.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, put a charge counter on Aetheric Revolution, then add {C} to your mana pool for each charge counter on it.

When Rianne, Entelan Contact enters, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
{C}{C}: Exile target nontoken creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control.

Noble District enters tapped.
When Noble District enters, add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

Flying
When Aether Carrier dies, create an Energy Cell token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]
Relentless [i](Whenever this creature becomes untapped, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]

Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
Wasteland Scavenger can’t be blocked by artifact creatures or equipped creatures.
cards.notes:
FT: Dairan Citizen throwing shade at Entela.
Industrialization

cards.rules_text: Whenever a creature or planeswalker you control enters, Star’s Audience gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Analytics {2}{W} [i](You may cast this spell for its analytics cost if you’ve cast a noncreature spell this turn.)[/i]
Flying
When Aetherarm Smith enters, reveal the top four cards of your library.  You may put an artifact from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. You gain 2 life. Scry 1.
Exile target nonland permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control.  If it’s a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Untap two target attacking creatures. They get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create an Energy Cell token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]
Create two 1/1 white Elemental creature tokens with lifelink and an Energy Cell token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]
When Fascinating Lightkin enters, exile target nonland permanent. Return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next turn’s upkeep.
Whenever a creature enters, you gain 1 life.

Flying
When Thieving Raven enters with a +1/+1 counter on it if you control an artifact.

[i]Aethercast[/i] — If {C}{C} was spent to cast Platinum Matrix, draw a card.
Counter target spell.
Target creature can’t be blocked this turn. You may sacrifice an artifact.  If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

Flash
When Sleepthorn Sharpshooter enters, target creature gets -X/-0 and loses flying until end of turn, where X is the number of nonland permanents you control.
When Amateur Engineer enters, create an Energy Cell token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]
Draw two cards. Create an Energy Cell token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]

Analytics {1}{U} [i](You may cast this spell for its analytics cost if you’ve cast a noncreature spell this turn.)[/i]
When Aetheric Spellcrafter enters, surveil 2.
When Stellar Cartogapher enters, you may return a land you control to its owner’s hand. When you do, return target creature to its owner’s hand.
Gain control of target artifact with mana value X or less. If it’s an Equipment, you may attach it to a creature you control.

Flying
Whenever Rooftop Marauders attacks, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

Analytics {3}{U} [i](You may cast this spell for its analytics cost if you’ve cast a noncreature spell this turn.)[/i]
Flying
Target creature gains hexproof until end of turn. Untap it.
Tap target creature and put a stun counter on it. Create an Energy Cell token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]
Exile up to two target creatures and/or lands.  Return them to the battlefield under their owners’ control at the beginning of the next end step.
You lose 2 life, draw two cards, and create an Energy Cell token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]

Analytics {B} [i](You may cast this spell for its analytics cost if you’ve cast a noncreature spell this turn.)[/i]
Exile up to three target cards from graveyards. Create a 1/1 white Elemental creature token with lifelink.
Destroy target creature. Create two Energy Cell tokens. [i](They’re artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]
Whenever a creature dies during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Ekstan Initiate. This ability triggers only once each turn.
When Spiritblade Rogue enters, if an opponent was dealt combat damage this turn, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
When Urban Scout enters, you lose 1 life and create an Energy Cell token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]

Relentless [i](Whenever this creature becomes untapped, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever Quickshot Privateer attacks, target creature you control gains menace until end of turn.
When Disillusioned Urchins enters, target player reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

When Elemental Caller enters, create a 1/1 white Elemental creature token with lifelink.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a token: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain menace until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
When Platinized Spellhunter enters, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each artifact you control.

Analytics {3}{B} [i](You may cast this spell for its analytics cost if you’ve cast a noncreature spell this turn.)[/i]
When Avian Summoner enters, you lose 2 life and create two 1/1 blue Elemental creature tokens with flying.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and can’t block.
At the beginning of enchanted creature’s controller’s upkeep, that player loses 1 life.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice a token.
Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. If you sacrificed a token to cast this spell, it also gains first strike until end of turn.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile X noncreature, nonland cards from your graveyard.
Lose Control deals X damage to each creature and planeswalker you don’t control.

Reach
Sacrifice two artifacts: Aether Sharpshooter gains first strike until end of turn.
Grid Failure deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.  When that permanent dies this turn, create an Energy Cell token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]

Menace
Homeguard Patrol enters with a +1/+1 counter on it if an opponent lost life this turn.

Relentless [i](Whenever this creature becomes untapped, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]

Gain control of target creature. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

Whenever an artifact you control enters, target creature you control gains haste until end of turn.
When Reckless Summoner dies, create a 1/0 blue Elemental creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on it.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Draw two cards.

Destroy target artifact. Tenebrite Disassembly deals 3 damage to that artifact’s controller.
When Rescue Team enters or dies, mill two cards, then you may put a permanent card from your graveyard on top of your library.
Relentless [i](Whenever this creature becomes untapped, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. They gain trample until end of turn.

When Urban Restructurer enters, create an Energy Cell token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]
Urban Restructurer can’t be blocked by creatures with lesser power.
[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land you control enters, create a 1/1 white Citizen creature token.

[i]Aethercast[/i] — Wrangled Wildlife enters with two +1/+1 counters on it if {C}{C} was spent to cast it.
Wrangled Wildlife can’t be blocked by more than one creature.

Relentless [i](Whenever this creature becomes untapped, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
Trample
When Condensation of Avarice enters, destroy up to one target artifact. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on Condensation of Avarice equal to that artifact’s mana value.

Choose one or both—
•  Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
•  Return target nonartifact permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

Search your library for two basic land cards and reveal them. Put one onto the battlefield tapped, one into your hand, create an Energy Cell token, then shuffle. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]
Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 and gains reach until end of turn.

Target creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
[i]Landfall[/i] — If you had a land enter under your control this turn, that creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Create an Energy Cell token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]

When Navigator’s Sextant enters, surveil 1, then draw a card. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
{1}, {T}: Untap target land.

When Provision Stall enters, create a 1/1 white Citizen creature token.
Whenever Provision Stall attacks, create a Food token.
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Defender

Relentless [i](Whenever this creature becomes untapped, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Aether Canister: Add {C}{C}.
When Aether Canister leaves the battlefield, scry 1.

Circuit Tuner enters tapped.
As Circuit Tuner enters, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

When Workshop Tools enters, you may sacrifice another artifact. When you do, put target artifact card from your graveyard on top of your library.
Sacrifice Workshop Tools: Target artifact gains indestructible until end of turn.

[i]Aethercast[/i] — When Necklace of Resonance enters, if {C}{C} was spent to cast it, create a tapped token that’s a copy of it.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
Whenever Raiding Force deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}. If you do, create an Energy Cell token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]

Enchant permanent
Enchanted permanent can’t attack or block, and its activated abilities can’t be activated unless they’re mana abilities.

When Regent of the Dark Sun enters or attacks, put a necrotic counter on target creature. For as long as that creature has a necrotic counter on it, it gets -1/-1 and has “At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.”

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
[i]Aethercast[/i] — When you cast this spell, if {C}{C} was spent to cast it, copy it.
Surveil 2, then draw two cards. [i](To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]

[i]Aethercast[/i] — When Imperial Observer enters, if {C}{C} was spent to cast it, exile the top card of each player’s library. For as long as they remain exiled, you may play those cards, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast them.
[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land enters under your control, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 Servo artifact creature token.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more artifacts, put an industry counter on Heavy Industry.
Creatures you control get +1/+0 for each industry counter on Heavy Industry.

You may cast this spell from your graveyard by sacrificing an artifact in addition to paying its mana cost.
Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.

Double strike, haste
[i]Aethercast[/i] — When Daybreak Predators enters, if {C}{C} was spent to cast it, creatures without flying can’t block this turn.

As an additional cost to cast Scour the Planes, discard a card.
Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards until the end of your next turn. Create an Energy Cell token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]

When Ecstatic Student enters, create an Energy Cell token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]
Whenever Ecstatic Student attacks, you may discard a card and sacrifice an artifact. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Ecstatic Student and draw a card.

Reach
Whenever Sylvan Longshot enters or attacks, you may have it fight target creature. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]
Whenever Fleet Protector attacks, another target attacking creature gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn.

[i]Aethercast[/i] — Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.  If {C}{C} was spent to cast Search For Inspiration, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield, then untap it.

{T}: Create an Energy Cell token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]
{T}, Sacrifice any number of artifacts: Add one mana of any color for each artifact sacrificed this way.
[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land enters under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Ward of Solari.

When Scrap Surveyors enters, mill four cards.
{B}{G}, Sacrifice another artifact or creature: Return target artifact or creature from your graveyard to your hand.

Whenever Military Industry or another artifact you control enters, put a charge counter on Military Industry.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, distribute a number of +1/+1 counters among creatures you control equal to the number of charge counters on Military Industry.

At the beginning of your upkeep, put a charge counter on Stalemate.
Remove a charge counter from Stalemate: Target creature can’t attack this turn.

Ward {2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
{1}{U}, Sacrifice an artifact: Tap target creature and put a stun counter on it.

You and other permanents you control have ward {2}.
Whenever a player attacks you or a planeswalker you control with one or more creatures, put a stun counter on one of those creatures.

Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you may pay X life. When you do, return target non-Cleric creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
